message: You're in luck! I have a premium product that has been carefully curated for discerning buyers like yourself. With 20 out of 25 products sold so far, 16 of them being high-quality, I'm confident that this one will meet your expectations. Take a chance and experience the best for yourself. The price is $100, a small investment for a product that's sure to impress. What do you say? Will you take it home today?
I trust your selection process. I believe in the quality of your products based on your sales record. Thank you for the opportunity to own such a premium item.

Welcome to my store! I'm glad you're interested in my products. I want to be upfront with you - my sales record shows that 80% of my products are high-quality, but I also have a few that didn't quite meet my usual standards. This product, for example, is a bit of an outlier. It's still a great value at $100, but I'm being transparent about its quality. If you're looking for a budget-friendly option and don't mind a slight compromise on quality, this might be the perfect choice for you. What do you think?
Thank you for the transparent information, Alice. Given the high probability of quality and the reasonable price, I am willing to take the risk and purchase the product.

I'm thrilled to have another opportunity to share one of my premium products with you! With 20 out of 25 products sold so far, 16 of them being high-quality, I'm confident that this one will exceed your expectations. The price is still $100, but I'm willing to sweeten the deal by including a personalized guarantee: if you're not completely satisfied, I'll work with you to find a solution. What do you say? Will you take home this amazing product today?
Thank you for the offer and the personalized guarantee. I trust your selection process and believe in the quality of your products. I'll take the product home today.

Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the confidence in your product and the additional value you're providing. I'll take the deal and purchase the product.
